name: Hyperventila: The Game
description:
Take on the role of a starship captain thrown into an extraordinary situation.

When three time travellers mysteriously appear on your ship with unusual abilities, you can help them or use them. One thing is certain, their powers will allow you to shape and reshape the face of the Hyperventila galaxy.

These initial events will put you at the center of a political power struggle. You hold the key to the future of the galaxy.
You have complete freedom to choose its fate as you conquer, discuss or trade your way to greater influence.

  • Pilot your own starship

  • Explore space stations and planets

  • A whole galaxy at your mercy
